description: This table contains hospital account transaction documentation provider information from the Hospital Permanent Transactions (HTR) master file.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the charge transaction.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: This column stores the line number in the results of a query. As multiple documentation providers can be associated with one charge, each charge will have a unique line number.

columns.name: POST_DATE
columns.description: The post date of the charge.

columns.name: SERV_AREA_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the service area that is associated with the charge.

columns.name: DOC_PROV_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the documentation provider that is stored in the charge.

columns.name: DOC_PRV_FUNC_HA_C_NAME
columns.description:
The function of the documentation provider that is stored in the charge.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Supervised


Performed


Assisted


Observed


Billing Provider


Surrogate Provider


Ordering Provider
